attributes.action: Rescind Article 50 because it is not in the national interest to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Electoral Commission's findings re. conduct of 2016 referendum.
Government's and local authorities' impact assessments.
Lack of preparedness of Government for any particular outcome.
National polling demonstrates a trend towards the public wishing to remain in the EU.
attributes.background: Public voted in 2016 EU referendum with inadequate and in some cases misleading information for guidance, as found by the Electoral Commission. They have a right to reconsider in light of new information, which enables them to make a properly informed decision on their and their families' futures.
